summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5490 for the improvement of Courtland Place, from Andover Street to Dakota Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70112, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
